plot outline: A woman divorces her husband when he blurts out in a drunken stupor that he slept with a widow. He hatches a plan to reconcile with his family after failing to reason with her. Will he be able to succeed in restoring their broken relationship or ends up in vain ?
title: Mane Devru
plot: A woman divorces her husband when he blurts out in a drunken stupor that he slept with a widow. He hatches a plan to reconcile with his family after failing to reason with her. Will he be able to succeed in restoring their broken relationship or ends up in vain ?::Google
